page.title: 14RECREATION FACILITIES
page.content: Until recently the children of Binegar and G.S. did not have a recreation ground so villagers combined to raise the money to create one in the middle of the village. The reward for their hard labour was to win a prize in a national competition for the project. Oakhill has its own recreation field and at the moment villagers are raising money for, and building, their own village hall upon it. Oakhill House restaurent was started 4 yrs. ago in a large house in the centre of the village and aims to provide fine food in pleasant surroundings. Mendip Gof Club also have their course within our quadrant which consists of a nine hole golf course and the club house near Maesbury castle. Binegar has its own village hall and hold various entertainments there including a Christmas pantomime.
